title: Utah
subtitle: Raft the Westwater Canyon of the Colorado River
short_description: Colorado River rafting doesnâ€™t get much better than this! Experience Westwater Canyon, a marvelous stretch of river often referred to as a miniature Grand Canyon. The beauty and grandeur of this section of the Colorado River offers memorable sights such as pristine beaches, charming side canyons with waterfalls, and beautiful campsites.
